[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [bubbles](./blockly.bubbles_namespace.md) &gt; [Bubble](./blockly.bubbles_namespace.bubble_class.md)

## bubbles.Bubble class

The abstract pop-up bubble class. This creates a UI that looks like a speech bubble, where it has a "tail" that points to the block, and a "head" that displays arbitrary svg elements.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare abstract class Bubble implements IBubble, ISelectable 
```
**Implements:** [IBubble](./blockly.ibubble_interface.md)<!-- -->, [ISelectable](./blockly.iselectable_interface.md)
